# insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a split view item to the array of split view items at the specified index position.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func insertSplitViewItem(_ splitViewItem: NSSplitViewItem, at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **splitViewItem**: The split view item to add.


- **index**: The index position for adding the split view item in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewController/splitViewItems] array.



## Discussion

If the split view controller’s view finishes loading, and the split view item that you add is visible, the system loads the split view item’s view controller’s view and adds it to the split view.

## Modifying a Split View Controller

- **addSplitViewItem(_:)**: Adds a split view item to the end of the array of split view items.
- **removeSplitViewItem(_:)**: Removes a specified split view item from the split view controller.
